game.name: Night Grove
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 이 게임은 1인칭 인디 호러 게임입니다. 한 젊은 배달원이 특이한 주문을 받고 나이트 그로브로 향합니다. 이곳은 오랫동안 사회에서 버려진 사람들과 함께 살도록 보내졌기 때문에 마을 사람들 사이에서 모호한 평판을 얻고 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a first-person indie horror game. A young deliveryman took an unusual order that led him to Night Grove. This place has a dubious reputation among the townspeople, because for many years it has been sent to live with people that society has long since abandoned.

reviewHighlights.text: Piece of poop :) Don´t buy it...there is plenty of horror games that are even cheaper..
After seeing the studio that made this game, I went in expecting it to be good, and they did not disappoint. It's a great game that is better optimize...
